api_list.name: Get File
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific file.

api_list.name: List Languages
api_list.description: Get the list of languages we support. The language codes included in the response will be required when placing orders via the API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Order
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific order.

api_list.name: Get Revision
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific revision.

api_list.name: Create File
api_list.description: Creates a new file. File uploads are limited to 100Mb in size. Each file may be attached to only one resource after creation.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Type of file - source or reference

api_list.name: Download File
api_list.description: Retrieve a temporary download URL for the file. Files are encrypted and stored in an Amazon S3 bucket. When you want to download a file this request will generate a temporary signed URL allowing access to download the file securely. URLs expire after two minutes.

api_list.name: List Revisions
api_list.description: Get a paginated list of your revisions sorted in descending order by requested_at date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com/revisions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rushtranslate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Orders
api_list.description: Get a paginated list of your orders sorted in descending order by received_at date.
